/usr/bin/c++  -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic                     -lglfw3 -lGL -lX11 -lpthread -lXrandr -lXi -ldl                     -O0 -g   CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/graphics/src/glad.c.o CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/graphics/src/c2Graphics.cpp.o CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/graphics/src/c2Shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/graphics/src/c2Functions.cpp.o CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/graphics/src/objects/c2World_Graphics.cpp.o CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/graphics/src/objects/c2Cell_Graphics.cpp.o CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/graphics/src/objects/c2Box_Graphics.cpp.o CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/graphics/src/objects/c2Grid_Graphics.cpp.o CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/graphics/src/gui/c2GUI.cpp.o CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/graphics/src/gui/c2Text.cpp.o CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/src/c2World.cpp.o CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/src/c2Collisions.cpp.o CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/src/c2Cell.cpp.o CMakeFiles/graphics.exe.dir/graphics/src/example.cpp.o  -o graphics.exe  /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lGL -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so -lm /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so -lpthread -ldl
